attributes.action: Ban smoking on residential premises when a business is carrying out work there
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I understand the law is designed to protect from passive smoking, but a problem still exists where a residential property becomes a temporary place of work for someone, eg an electrician or builder. 

Passive smoking kills, we have the proof of this, yet still workmen are being subjected to householders who smoke while work in their home is taking place. 

It should be made illegal for that person to smoke at all in the home for 2 hours prior and during the time the work is taking place.
